      • hasPerm

        public static boolean hasPerm(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender player,
              String perm)
                       throws NullPointerException
        Check the permission with an error message if the user don't have the Permission
        Parameters:
        player - player to check the permission
        perm - permission node
        Returns:
        if the user have or not the permission
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when the permission node is null

      • hasPerm

              String perm,
              boolean errorMsg)
                       throws NullPointerException
        Check the permission with the possibility to disable the error msg
        Parameters:
        player - player to check the permission
        perm - permission node
        errorMsg - send or not an error message to the user if he don't have the permission
        Returns:
        if the user have or not the permission
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - when the permission node is null
